amendment.description: Amendments en bloc comprised of amendments numbered 107, 108, 109, 110, 111, 119, 120, 121, 125, 126, and 127 printed in House Report 114-112. See page D551 of the Congressional Record of May 15, 2015 for description of en bloc amendments.
amendment.purpose: An amendment comprised of the following amendments offered as en bloc No.7: 107, 108, 109, 110, 111, 119, 120, 121, 125, 126, and 127 printed in House Report 114-112.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Thornberry amendments (A022) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendments en bloc (A022) offered by Mr. Thornberry.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendments en bloc (A022) offered by Mr. Thornberry.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Thornberry amendments (A022) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
